## Get Started with Faster .NET Upgrades Today!

**Step 2: Use Copilot Agent Mode** To unlock the full power of AI-assisted upgrades, install the latest version of [Visual Studio 17.14](https://visualstudio.microsoft.com/downloads/) and sign-in to a GitHub account with an active Copilot subscription.

1. **Ensure you have agent mode enabled:** In Visual Studio, go to Tools > Options > GitHub > Copilot > Copilot Chat and select ‚ÄúEnable agent mode in the chat pane.‚Äù
2. **Turn on Agent Mode**: To get started, open the GitHub Copilot Chat window, click the ‚Äú**Ask**‚Äù button, then click ‚Äú**Agent**‚Äù. This turns on Copilot Agent Mode, which gives you a smarter, more natural way to do the upgrades.
3. **Select the Upgrade Tool:** Once in Copilot Agent Mode, be sure to select the ‚Äú**Upgrade‚Äù** tool from the Copilot Chat Tool Selector. Otherwise, Agent Mode won‚Äôt be able to use the specialized upgrade tools.

For more information on Agent Mode, check out [our blog](https://devblogs.microsoft.com/visualstudio/agent-mode-has-arrived-in-preview-for-visual-studio/) on the topic.
